title: FS: T206 Polar Bear and Southern Leaguers [ALL CARDS ARE SOLD]
author: jmanners51

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Polar Bear and Southern Leaguers [ALL CARDS ARE SOLD]
posts.post_content:
Available for sale is the following ungraded T206:

POLAR BEAR:

Clark Griffith (Batting) - SOLD
Hal Chase (Blue Portrait) - SOLD
Nap Rucker (Throwing) - SOLD
Harry Davis (Front) - SOLD
Red Ames (Hands Over Head) - SOLD

SOUTHERN LEAGUERS:

Bock Hooker (Piedmont) - SOLD
Ernie Howard (Piedmont) - SOLD
Ed Foster (Old Mill) - $115 [SOLD]

Add $5 Shipping and Handling for a total purchase under $150 and $10 Shipping and Handling for a total purchase over $150.

If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

I’ll take

Harry Davis (Front) - $45
Red Ames (Hands Over Head) - $45
Ernie Howard (Piedmont) - $90
I'll take Hooker.  Will send pm
